name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field
display_help: The Force Field powers give you the ability to create shells of energy that protect yourself and your allies from various forms of damage and harm. Force Fields do not reduce damage, but reduced your allies chance of getting hit in the first place.

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field.Personal_Force_Field
powers.display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of almost any attacks that do get through. The Personal Force Field works both ways; while it is active, you can only use powers that affect yourself. Cannot be used with Rest. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 100.0 only affect self for 0.75s on self
67.50% strength to defense for 0.75s on self
40.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self
50.00% strength to defense for 0.75s on self
67.50% strength to smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic for 0.75s on self
40.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field.Deflection_Shield
powers.display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from Smashing, Lethal and all Melee attacks for a limited time. Also reduces Toxic damage. You cannot stack multiple Deflection Shields on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Insulation Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 11.25% strength to melee, smashing for 4m 0s on target
11.25% strength to lethal for 4m 0s on target
30.00% resistance to toxic damage for 4m 0s on target

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field.Force_Bolt
powers.display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

display_info: Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field.Insulation_Shield
powers.display_help: Dramatically protects an ally from Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Ranged and AoE attacks for a limited time. The Insulation also protects the target from Endurance Draining effects. You cannot stack multiple Insulation Shields on the same target; however, the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Deflection Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, Ranged, AoE), Res (End Drain)

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 11.25% strength to ranged, AoE, fire, energy, negative energy for 4m 0s on target
11.25% strength to cold for 4m 0s on target
69.20% resistance to endurance debuff, recovery rate debuff for 4m 0s on target

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field.Refraction_Shield
powers.display_help: Encases a targeted foe in a Detention Force Field. The captured target cannot be harmed, is Immobilized, and cannot attack or aid their allies. The target can, however, use powers on themselves. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 7.4 magnitude immobilize, magnitude untouchable, magnitude only affect self for 30s on target
4.0 magnitude untouchable, magnitude only affect self for 8s on target

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field.Dispersion_Bubble
powers.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increased Defense against all attack types. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow

display_info.Aggro Type: Enemies will not notice this attack

display_info: 7.50% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 2.25s on target
-10.4 hold protection, immobilize protection, stun protection for 2.25s on target
103.80% resistance to hold, immobilize, stun for 2.25s on target

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field.Repulsion_Field
powers.display_help: This Toggle power creates a field that violently repels nearby foes. Each villain that is repelled costs you additional Endurance. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 110.00% chance for 6.2 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field.Repulsion_Bomb
powers.display_help: A powerful Repulsion Bomb is hurled at your foes dealing a moderate amount of damage and knocking them off of their feet. Foes struck by Repulsion Bomb have a good chance to become disoriented. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Disorient

display_info: Only against immobilized, held, sleeping or stunned targets
40.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 14.9s on target after 0.13s delay
40.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 4s on target after 0.13s delay

powers.name: Controller_Buff.Force_Field.Force_Bubble
powers.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, this power keeps all foes at bay, protecting all allies inside from melee or short ranged attacks. More powerful foes may be able to penetrate the Force Bubble, but may slip and get knocked down and forced back if they try. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 1.00% chance for 0.1 magnitude knock on target
1.00% chance for 0.1 magnitude knock on target
